home.headline: Data Scientist focused on industrial ML, MLOps, and product delivery.
about: I build production-grade data products end-to-end: data pipelines, modeling, deployment, and monitoring.
Recent work includes predictive maintenance and ML monitoring systems, with a strong emphasis on reproducibility and reliability.

work.title: Data Scientist / ML Engineer
highlights: Built an industrial equipment health monitoring pipeline and dashboard.
Implemented feature extraction on sensor waveform data and trained interpretable models.
Deployed reproducible workflows with environment management and automated reporting.

projects.title: Brilliant Automation
projects.tagline: Interpretable ML for industrial equipment health monitoring.
bullets: Sensor data ingestion, DSP feature extraction, model training and evaluation.
Dashboard for equipment health signals and operational metrics.

projects.title: JobAI
projects.tagline: AI job application assistant (resume/profile parsing + workflows).
bullets: FastAPI backend with profile/resume parsing and structured outputs.
Roadmap includes credits billing + automation extensions.
